attributes.action: Give "common law" partners  the same rights as married/civil partners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government uses income from both partners for means tested benefits and CSA payments whether married or not, so the government should give the same rights to Common law partners as is afforded married and civil partnerships.After a certain period of time the relationship/partnership should be seen as the same as a Marriage or Civil Partnership. Many common law partners invest money, time and hard work into their partners homes only to be afforded no protection should the relationship break down.
